revised_title: Spacelab: A Platform for Materials Science Experiments in Low Gravity Conditions
tldr: This article discusses the Spacelab project, an orbital platform for conducting experiments in various scientific applications and technological fields. It describes the design and capabilities of Spacelab, including its pressurized module and unpressurized pallet, and the various facilities and experiments available for materials science research in low gravity conditions. The article also highlights the cost aspects and potential future developments of the Spacelab program.
